question: Analyze the technology adoption trends of companies within the healthcare industry.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Identify all companies operating in the healthcare industry from the CompanyInfo table.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":2,"task":"Gather the technology stacks of identified healthcare companies using the CompanyTechStack table.","table":["CompanyTechStack"]},{"step":3,"task":"Extract partnership details related to healthcare technology from the CompanyITPartnerDetail table to understand collaboration trends.","table":["CompanyITPartnerDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Compile the strategic technology focus areas of healthcare companies from the CompanyFocusAreaDetail table to identify their innovation priorities.","table":["CompanyFocusAreaDetail"]},{"step":5,"task":"Summarize and analyze the data collected to report on technology adoption trends in the healthcare industry.","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyTechStack","CompanyITPartnerDetail","CompanyFocusAreaDetail"]}]}
